Test Piece Contest
Don Carlo
Markeaton Park, Derby March contest (£1) - 1st Long Eaton, 2nd (10s) - Derby Sax Tuba. Prizes - 1st £10, 2nd £6, 3rd £3, 4th £2, 5th £1. Promoted by Derby Agricultural Society. 5 bands competed.
Oct. 24, 2020, 7:36 p.m. Oct. 24, 2020, 7:52 p.m.
1 Long Eaton Silver Prize Band Henry Evetts
2 Derby Sax and Tuba J. Pegg
3 Matlock Band L. Wildgoose
4 Alvaston and Boulton J. E. Irons
5 Mapperley Colliery Sam Taylor
